author: Demetri Sevastopulo
title: Donald Trump says coronavirus has ‘passed the peak’ in US
description: Donald Trump says he will announce guidelines to reopen the economy on Thursday, with the US president claiming the country has passed the peak of new coronavirus cases as the death toll topped 28,000 people. “The data suggests that nationwide we are past the…
content:
Donald Trump says he will announce guidelines to reopen the economy on Thursday, with the US president claiming the country has passed the peak of new coronavirus cases as the death toll topped 28,000 people.
The data suggests that nationwide we are past the… [+3862 chars]
